channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Reporter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Reporter

item.title: CVE-2017-15531|2024-09-16T19:15:56.968Z -- symantec%20corporation -- reporter
item.description: Symantec Reporter 9.5 prior to 9.5.4.1 and 10.1 prior to 10.1.5.5 does not restrict excessive authentication attempts for management interface users. A remote attacker can use brute force search to guess a user password and gain access to Reporter.
